recipesJson.name: Vanilladon
recipesJson.author: Ebc88
recipesJson.description:
My son pitched a fit for these Vanilladon cookies awhile back when we were at the grocery store. They are a vanilla cookie with red & blue icing, & has a dinosaur of the packaging for the new Jurassic Park movie (that’s all he really cared about was the dinosaur on the packaging). I didn’t want to just make a plain vanilla cookie with plain icing. So I made a vanilla cookie with strawberry & blueberry striped icing. Happy with how this turned out. It is good of the shake but around day 10 is when I would say it is fully steeped. 

For the cookie itself it when with a combo of Cap sugar cookie & FA cookie. I like both so I not gonna get in the argument between I-d10t & Mr. ConcreteRiver on which one is better. The sugar cookie brings a sweet chewy sugar cookie, & the FA brings a more firm harder cookie.

FA Meringue i added it for some sweet creaminess to help turn the fruits into more of an icing.

INW Shisha Strawberry: Its my favorite strawberry it stands alone by itself and doesn’t fade like other strawberries, and it has a slight syrup/jam quality to it.

FW Blueberry: A few months back I mixed up DentMans https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/46737  which really showcases FW Blueberry as a frosting/icing so I stole it from him and used it in my mix and it worked beautifully  

Holy Vanilla: is the perfect vanilla for bakeries it is a really rich & creamy vanilla.

If you haven’t mixed up Dentman Angel Food Cake W/ Blueberry Frosting I would suggest giving that a try as well.

If you take the time to mix Please rate & review
